content: {"name": "Crisis Control Ministry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We conduct phone interviews for assistance as well as in-person interviews. Please call our Client Services phone line in Winston-Salem at 336.724.7453 or in Kernersville at 336.996.5401 to see if we are able to assist you.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.crisiscontrol.org/what-we-do/services/information-to-bring.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "200 10th Street East", "address_2": null, "city": "Winston-Salem", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27101", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 36.1062735, "longitude": -80.2430619}, "phones": [{"number": "(336) 724-7453", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
